description:
Whether at the office over a shirt or with both feet in the river under fishing wadders, our prospector knit will make you happy.

Made from 100% recycled polyester with ribbed cuffs and hem, it'll give you just the right amount of warmth and comfort, especially on those prospecting days on the river. Its reinforced forearms and shoulders give it an improvement in terms of its durability, but also a heritage look that can be combined with several everyday moments.
name: Hooke Prospector Sweater - Mens
